SEARCH
Package report

Class ReportController

java.lang.Object
report.ReportController
public class ReportController extends Object
Manages the generation and writing of various reports, such as camp lists and performance reports. Only has static methods
Since:
2023-11-03

  • Method Details

    • generateUniqueFilename

      public static String generateUniqueFilename()
      Overload of the generateUniqueFilename method with all default values set in constructor.
      Returns:
      A unique filename generated based on the default baseFilename and reportOutputType.
      See Also:
      • generateUniqueFilename(String baseFilename, ReportOutputType reportOutputType)

    • generateUniqueFilename

      public static String generateUniqueFilename(String baseFilename)
      Overload of the generateUniqueFilename method with default reportOutputType.
      Parameters:
      baseFilename - The string parameter for the report file name.
      Returns:
      A unique filename generated based on the specified baseFilename and the default reportOutputType.
      See Also:
      • generateUniqueFilename(String baseFilename, ReportOutputType reportOutputType)

    • generateUniqueFilename

      public static String generateUniqueFilename(String baseFilename, ReportOutputType reportOutputType)
      Generate a unique filename, accounting for conflicts where the file already exists. Conflicts means the name will become "filname" + "_number"
      Parameters:
      baseFilename - The string parameter for the report file name.
      reportOutputType - The ReportOutputType parameter from enum ReportOutputType.
      Returns:
      The final name of the report file after handling conflicts.

    • fileExists

      public static boolean fileExists(String filename)
      Check if a file with the given name already exists.
      Parameters:
      filename - The string parameter for the file name to check.
      Returns:
      True if the file with the given name exists; otherwise, false.

    • getFilePath

      private static String getFilePath(String fileName)
      Return the path to the save location for report files.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The string parameter for the file name.
      Returns:
      The full file path of the report file.

    • writeReportToFile

      public static void writeReportToFile(String content, String filePath, ReportOutputType reportOutputType)
      Write the report details to a file using the appropriate writer. Chooses output file type using instance variable
      Parameters:
      filePath - The string parameter for the file path to save the report to.
      data - The string parameter for the data to write.

    • generateAndWriteReports

      public static void generateAndWriteReports(List<Camp> camps, FilterObj filterObj, ReportType reportType)
      Generate and write reports for a list of camps and a specific report type.
      Parameters:
      camps - The list of camps for which to generate and write reports.
      filterObj - The filter options for the report.
      reportType - The specific report type to generate (e.g., CAMP_LIST or PERFORMANCE_REPORT).
      See Also:
      • generateAndWriteReports(List<Camp> camps, FilterObj filterObj, ReportType reportType, ReportOutputType reportOutputType, String fileName)

    • generateAndWriteReports

      public static void generateAndWriteReports(List<Camp> camps, FilterObj filterObj, ReportType reportType, ReportOutputType reportOutputType)
      Generate and write reports for a list of camps and a specific report type.
      Parameters:
      camps - The list of camps for which to generate and write reports.
      filterObj - The filter options for the report.
      reportType - The specific report type to generate (e.g., CAMP_LIST or PERFORMANCE_REPORT).
      reportOutputType - The type of report to generate (TXT or CSV).
      See Also:
      • generateAndWriteReports(List<Camp> camps, FilterObj filterObj, ReportType reportType, ReportOutputType reportOutputType, String fileName)

    • generateAndWriteReports

      public static void generateAndWriteReports(List<Camp> camps, FilterObj filterObj, ReportType reportType, ReportOutputType reportOutputType, String fileName)
      Generate and write reports for a list of camps, a specific report type, and a custom file name.
      Parameters:
      camps - The list of camps for which to generate and write reports.
      filterObj - The filter options for the report.
      reportType - The specific report type to generate.
      reportOutputType - The type of report to generate (TXT or CSV).
      fileName - The custom file name for the report.
